GK20hdratn_u:5: viśliṣyan kusumāñjalir girijayā kṣipto 'ntare pātu vaḥ // 1 // (1.1)
GK20hdratn_u:8: tais tair bandhuvadhūjanasya vacanair nītābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:9: dṛṣṭvāgre varam āttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave saṃgame
GK20hdratn_u:10: saṃrohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ // 2 // (1.2)
GK20hdratn_u:12: krodheddhair dṛṣtipātais tribhir upaśamitā vahnayo 'mī trayo 'pi
GK20hdratn_u:14: dakṣaḥ stautyasya patnī vilapati kṛpaṇaṃ vidrutaṃ cāpi devaiḥ
GK20hdratn_u:15: śaṃsan nityāttahāso makhamathanavidhau pātu devyai śivo vaḥ // 3 // (1.3)
GK20hdratn_u:24: adyāhaṃ vasantotsave sabahumānam āhūya nānādigdeśāgatena rājñaḥ śrīharṣadevasya pādapadmopajīvinā rājasamūhenokto yathā /
GK20hdratn_u:25: asmatsvāminā śrīharṣadevenāpūrvavasturacanālaṅkṛtā ratnāvalī nāma nāṭikā kṛtety asmābhiḥ śrotraparamparayā śrutā na tu prayogato dṛṣṭā /
GK20hdratn_u:26: tat tasyaiva rājñaḥ sakalajanahṛdayāhlādino bahumānād asmāsu cānugrahabuddhyā yathāvat prayogeṇa tvayā nāṭayitavyeti /
GK20hdratn_u:27: tad yāvad idānīṃ nepathyaracanāṃ kṛtvā yathābhilaṣitaṃ saṃpādayāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:30: āvarjitāni sakalasāmājikānāṃ manāṃsīti me niścayaḥ / kutaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:31: śrīharṣo nipuṇaḥ kaviḥ pariṣad apy eṣā guṇagrāhiṇī
GK20hdratn_u:32: loke hāri ca vatsarājacaritaṃ nāṭye ca dakṣā vayaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:33: vastv ekaikam apīha vāñchitaphalaprāpteḥ padaṃ kiṃ punar
GK20hdratn_u:34: madbhāgyopacayād ayaṃ samuditaḥ sarvo guṇānāṃ gaṇaḥ // 5 // (1.5)
GK20hdratn_u:35: tad yāvad ahaṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā gṛhiṇīm āhūya saṃgītakam anutiṣṭhāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:54: mama uṇa mandabhāiṇīe ekkā jjevva duhidā /
GK20hdratn_u:55: sā vi tae kahiṃ pi desantare diṇṇā /
GK20hdratn_u:56: dūraṭṭhideṇa jāmāduṇā se pāṇiggahaṇaṃ kadhaṃ bhavissadi tti imāe cintāe appā vi ṇa me paḍibhādi /
GK20hdratn_u:61: dvīpād anyasmād api madhyād api jalanidher diśo 'py antāt /
GK20hdratn_u:62: ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhir abhimatam abhimukhībhūtaḥ // 6 // (1.6)
GK20hdratn_u:71: nanv ayaṃ mama kanīyān bhrātā gṛhītayaugandharāyaṇabhūmikaḥ prāpta eva /
GK20hdratn_u:81: anyathā kva siddhādeśapratyayaprārthitāyāḥ siṃhaleśvaraduhituḥ samudre pravahaṇabhaṅganimagnāyāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:82: phalakāsādanaṃ kva ca kauśāmbīyena vaṇijā siṃhalebhyaḥ pratyāgacchatā tadavasthāyāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:86: mayāpi caināṃ devīhaste sagauravaṃ nikṣipatā yuktam evānuṣṭhitam /
GK20hdratn_u:88: bābhravyo 'pi kañcukī vasubhūtinā siṃhaleśvarāmātyena saha kathaṃ katham api samudrād uttīrya kosalocchittaye gatasya rumaṇvato milita iti /
GK20hdratn_u:89: tad evaṃ niṣpannaprāyam api prayojanaṃ na me dhṛtim āvahati /
GK20hdratn_u:99: yathāyam abhihanyamānamṛdumṛdaṅgānugatasaṃgītamadhuraḥ puraḥ paurāṇām uccarati carcarīdhvanis tathā tarkayāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:100: madanamahamahīyāṃsaṃ purajanapramodam avalokayituṃ prāsādābhimukhaṃ prasthito deva iti /
GK20hdratn_u:103: adhirūḍha eva devaḥ prāsādaṃ / ya eṣa
GK20hdratn_u:108: tad yāvad gṛhaṃ gatvā kāryaśeṣaṃ cintayāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:111: tataḥ praviśaty āsanastho gṛhītavasantotsavaveṣo rājā vasantakaś ca /
GK20hdratn_u:116: rājyaṃ nirjitaśatru yogyasacive nyastaḥ samasto bharaḥ
GK20hdratn_u:118: pradyotasya sutā vasantasamayas tvaṃ ceti nāmnā dhṛtiṃ
GK20hdratn_u:119: kāmaḥ kāmam upaitv ayaṃ mama punar manye mahān utsavaḥ // 9 // (1.9)
GK20hdratn_u:124: ṇa bhavado ṇa kāmadevassa mama jjevva ekkassa bamhaṇassa aaṃ maaṇamahūsavo tti jeṇa piavaasseṇa tumaṃ ti mantīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:132: parāṃ koṭim adhirohati pramodaḥ puraḥ paurānām / tathā hi /
GK20hdratn_u:142: edaṃ pi dāva suviaḍḍhajaṇāpūridasiṅgaajalapahāramukkasikkāramaṇoharaṃ vāravilāsiṇījaṇavilasidaṃ avaloedu piavaasso /
GK20hdratn_u:153: esā khu maaṇiā maaṇasarisaṃ vasantāhiṇaaṃ ṇaccantī cūdaladiāe saha ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:154: tataḥ praviśato madalīlāṃ nāṭayantyau dvipadīkhaṇḍaṃ gāyantyau cetyau /
GK20hdratn_u:160: iha paḍhamaṃ mahumāso jaṇassa hiaāi kuṇai mauāiṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:164: srastaḥ sragdāmaśobhāṃ tyajati viracitām ākulaḥ keśapāśaḥ
GK20hdratn_u:165: kṣībāyā nūpurau ca dviguṇataram imau krandataḥ pādalagnau /
GK20hdratn_u:166: vyastaḥ kampānubandhād anavaratam uro hanti hāro 'yam asyāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:169: ahaṃ pi edāṇaṃ baddhapariarāṇaṃ majjhe ṇaccanto maaṇamahūsavaṃ māṇaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:196: (1.30) Vidūṣakaḥ / hastam ākṛṣya prapalāyya rājānam upasṛtya /
GK20hdratn_u:213: nanv ājñāpayatīty eva ramaṇīyaṃ viśeśato 'dya madanamahotsave /
GK20hdratn_u:219: ajja mae maarandujjāṇaṃ gadua rattāsoasaṃṭhidassa bhaavado kusumāuhassa pūā ṇivvattidavvā /
GK20hdratn_u:225: tahiṃ jevva gacchamha jeṇa tahiṃ gadassa mama vi bamhaṇassa sotthivāaṇaṃ kiṃ pi bhavissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:228: ayam aham āgata eva makarandodyānam iti /
GK20hdratn_u:255: bhrāntiṃ prāpya madhuprasaṅgam adhunā mattā ivāmī drumāḥ // 17 // (1.17)
GK20hdratn_u:256: api ca /mūle gaṇḍūṣasekāsava iva bakulair vamyate puṣpavṛṣtyā
GK20hdratn_u:257: madhvātāmre taruṇyā mukhaśaśini cirāc campakāny adya bhānti /
GK20hdratn_u:266: tataḥ praviśati vāsavadattā kāñcanamālā sāgarikā vibhavataś ca parīvārāḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:275: adha kettia dūre dāṇiṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ mae bhaavado maaṇassa pūā ṇivvattidavvā /
GK20hdratn_u:280: iaṃ khu ṇirantarubbhiṇṇakusumasohiṇī bhaṭṭiṇīe parigahidā māhavīladā /
GK20hdratn_u:281: esā khu avarā ṇomāliāladā jāe aālakusumasamuggamasaddhālueṇa bhaṭṭiṇā appā āāsīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:282: tā edaṃ adikkamia dīsadi jjevva so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ devī pūaṃ ṇivvattaissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:290: aaṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ pūaṃ nivvattaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:291: teṇa hi me pūāṇimittāiṃ uvaaraṇāiṃ uvaṇehi /
GK20hdratn_u:298: jassa daṃsaṇapadhādo rakkhīadi tassa jjevva diṭṭhigoaraṃ paḍidā bhave /
GK20hdratn_u:302: kīsa tumaṃ ajja maaṇamahūsavaparāhīṇe pariaṇe sāriaṃ ujjhia idha āadā /
GK20hdratn_u:304: edaṃ pi savvaṃ pūovaaraṇaṃ kañcaṇamālāe hatthe samappehi /
GK20hdratn_u:306: tathā kṛtvā kati cit padāni gatvātmagatam /
GK20hdratn_u:308: evvaṃ pi atthi me kodūhalaṃ pekkhiduṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:309: kiṃ jadhā tādassa anteure bhaavaṃ aṇaṅgo accīadi idha vi tadhā jevva kiṃ vā aṇṇadha tti /
GK20hdratn_u:312: jāva idha pūāsamao bhodi tāva ahaṃ pi bhaavantaṃ maaṇaṃ jevva pūiduṃ kusumāiṃ avaciṇissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:342: sahatthadiṇṇakusumakuṅkumacandaṇathāsaehiṃ sohidaṃ kadua rattāsoapāavaṃ accīadu bhaavaṃ pajjuṇṇo /
GK20hdratn_u:354: api ca / anaṅgo 'yam anaṅgatvam adya nindiṣyati dhruvam /
GK20hdratn_u:355: yad anena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇisparśotsavas tava // 22 // (1.22)
GK20hdratn_u:361: teṇa hi uvaṇehi me kusumāiṃ vilevaṇaṃ ca /
GK20hdratn_u:370: tā imiṇā sinduvāraviḍavena vāridā bhavia pekkhāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:373: paccakkho jjevva bhaavaṃ kusumāuho pūaṃ paḍicchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:374: tā ahaṃ pi imehiṃ kusumehiṃ idhaṭṭhidā jevva bhaavantaṃ kusumāuhaṃ pūaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:382: tā jāva ṇa ko vi pekkhadi tāva jjevva gamissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:398: āsthānīṃ samaye samaṃ nṛpajanaḥ sāyantane saṃpatan /
GK20hdratn_u:399: saṃpraty eva saroruhadyutim uṣaḥ pādāṃs tavāsevituṃ
GK20hdratn_u:403: aaṃ so rāā udaaṇo jassa ahaṃ tādeṇa diṇṇā /
GK20hdratn_u:404: tā parapesaṇakarisidaṃ me sarīraṃ edassa daṃsaṇeṇa bahumadaṃ samvuttaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:405: (1.81) Rājā / katham / utsavāpahṛtacetobhiḥ saṃdhyātikramo 'py asmābhir nopalakṣitaḥ / devi / paśya /
GK20hdratn_u:417: mandabhāinīe mae pekkhiduṃ pi ciraṃ ṇa pārido aaṃ jaṇo /
GK20hdratn_u:429: adha kahiṃ dāṇiṃ mama hatthe imaṃ sāriaṃ ṇikkhivia gadā me piasahī sāariā bhavissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:431: esā khu ṇiuṇiā ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:433: (2.2) Nipuṇikā / uvaladdho kkhu mae bhaṭṭiṇo vuttanto /
GK20hdratn_u:437: kahiṃ dāṇiṃ tumaṃ vimhaākhittahiaā via idhaṭṭhidaṃ maṃ avadhīria ido adikkamasi /
GK20hdratn_u:443: ajja kila bhaṭṭā siripavvadādo āadassa sirikhaṇḍadāsaṇāmadheassa dhammiassa saāsādo
GK20hdratn_u:444: aālakusumasaṃjaṇaṇadohalaṃ sikkhia attaṇo parigahidaṃ ṇomāliaṃ kusumasamiddhisohidaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:445: karissadi tti edaṃ vuttantaṃ devīe ṇivediduṃ pesida mhi /
GK20hdratn_u:448: (2.6) Nipuṇikā / diṭṭhā mae sāariā gahidasamuggaacittaphalaavaṭṭiā kaalīharaṃ pavisantī /
GK20hdratn_u:453: tataḥ praviśati gṛhītacitraphalakā madanāvasthāṃ nāṭayantī sāgarikā /
GK20hdratn_u:458: jeṇa jjevva diṭṭhametteṇa īdiso saṃtāvo vaṭṭadi puṇo vi taṃ jevva pekkhiduṃ ahilasasi tti aho de mūḍhadā /
GK20hdratn_u:460: jammado pahudi saha saṃvaḍḍhidaṃ imaṃ jaṇaṃ pariccaia khaṇamettadaṃsaṇaparicidaṃ jaṇaṃ aṇuacchanto ṇa lajjasi /
GK20hdratn_u:467: ṇijjidasurāsuro bhavia itthījaṇaṃ paharanto ṇa lajjasi /
GK20hdratn_u:468: savvadhā mama mandabhāiṇīe imiṇā duṇṇimitteṇa avassaṃ maraṇaṃ uvaṭṭhidaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:470: tā jāva ṇa ko vi idha āacchadi tāva ālekkhasamappidaṃ taṃ ahimadaṃ jaṇaṃ pekkhia jadhāsamīhidaṃ karissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:471: sāvaṣṭambham ekamanā bhūtvā nāṭyena phalakaṃ gṛhītvā niḥśvas
GK20hdratn_u:472: ya / jai vi adisaddhaseṇa vevadi aaṃ adimettaṃ me aggahattho tadhā vi tassa jaṇassa aṇṇo daṃsaṇovāo ṇatthi tti jadhā tadhā ālihia pekkhissaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:478: kiṃ uṇa esā garuāṇurāākhittahiaā ālihantī ṇa maṃ pekkhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:479: tā jāva diṭṭhipadhaṃ se pariharia ṇirūvaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:480: svairaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'syāḥ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā ca saharṣam /
GK20hdratn_u:484: adha vā ṇa kamalāaraṃ vajjia rāahaṃsī aṇṇassiṃ ahiramadi /
GK20hdratn_u:487: kiṃ uṇa ṇivaḍantabāhasalilā me diṭṭhī pekkhiduṃ ṇa pahavadi /
GK20hdratn_u:488: ūrdhvam aśrūṇi saṃharantī susaṃgatāṃ dṛṣṭvottarīyeṇa pracchādayantī vilokya smitaṃ kṛtvā /
GK20hdratn_u:500: kiṃ uṇa suṇṇaṃ via cittaṃ paḍibhādi /
GK20hdratn_u:501: tā ahaṃ pi ālihia radisaṇādhaṃ karissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:508: jādiso tae kāmadevo ālihido tādisī mae radī ālihidā /
GK20hdratn_u:509: tā aṇṇadhāsaṃbhāviṇi kiṃ tuha ediṇā ālavideṇa /
GK20hdratn_u:516: tā tadhā karesu jadhā ṇa avaro ko vi edaṃ vuttantaṃ jāṇissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:519: īdisassa kaṇṇaāraanassa avassaṃ jevva īdise vare ahilāseṇa hodavvaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:520: tadhā vi jadhā ṇa ko vi avaro edaṃ vuttantaṃ jāṇissadi tadhā karemi /
GK20hdratn_u:521: edāe uṇa medhāviṇīe sāriāe ettha kāraṇeṇa hodavvaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:522: kadā vi esā imassa ālāvassa gahidakkharā kassa vi purado mantaissadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:524: ado vi me adhiadaraṃ saṃtāvo vaṭṭadi /
GK20hdratn_u:528: jāva imādo digghiādo ṇaliṇīvattaāiṃ muṇāliāo a geṇhia lahuṃ lahuṃ āacchāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:529: niṣkramya punaḥ praviṣṭā nāṭyena nalinīpattrāṇi sāgarikāyā hṛdaye nikṣipati /
GK20hdratn_u:536: piasahi visamaṃ pemmaṃmaraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇavaram ekkaṃ // 26 // (2.1)
GK20hdratn_u:539: kaṇṭhe kṛttāvaśeṣaṃ kanakamayam adhaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma karṣan
GK20hdratn_u:542: prabhraṣṭo 'yaṃ plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpater mandiraṃ mandurāyāḥ // 27 // (2.2)
GK20hdratn_u:543: api ca /naṣṭaṃ varṣavarair manuṣyagaṇanābhāvād apāsya trapām
GK20hdratn_u:544: antaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsād ayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:545: paryantāśrayibhir nijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:550: eso kkhu duṭṭhavāṇaro ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:558: kadā vi ko vi taṃ pekkhissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:561: eso vi dadhibhattalampaḍo edaṃ pañjaraṃ ugghāḍia duṭṭhavāṇaro adikkanto /
GK20hdratn_u:562: esā khu medhāviṇī uḍḍīṇā aṇnado gacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:573: puṇo vi duṭṭhavāṇaro jjevva āacchadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:577: bhaṭṭiṇo parivāsavattī khu eso ajja vasantao /
GK20hdratn_u:589: jeṇa diṇṇametteṇa jjevva dohalaeṇa īdisī ṇomāliā saṃvuttā jeṇa ṇirantarubbhiṇṇakusumagucchacchādidaviḍavā uvahasantī via lakkhīadi devīparigahidaṃ māhavīladaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:592: eso kkhu piavaasso tassa dohalaassa laddhappaccaadāe parokkhaṃ pi taṃ ṇomāliaṃ paccakkhaṃ via kusumidaṃ pekkhanto harisupphullaloaṇo ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:599: adyodyānalatām imāṃ samadanāṃ nārīm ivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:600: paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmy aham // 29 // (2.4)
GK20hdratn_u:608: tad ādeśaya mārgaṃ yena vayam api tadālokanena cakṣuṣaḥ phalam anubhavāmaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:612: (2.38) Vidūṣakaḥ / ākarṇya sabhayaṃ nivṛtya rājānaṃ haste gṛhītvā sasaṃbhramam /
GK20hdratn_u:617: edassiṃ baulapāave ko vi bhūdo paḍivasadi /
GK20hdratn_u:622: jai mama vaaṇaṃ ṇa pattiāasi tā aggado bhavia saaṃ jevva āaṇṇehi /
GK20hdratn_u:632: tumaṃ bhaāluo jeṇa sāriaṃ bhūdaṃ ti mantesi /
GK20hdratn_u:634: yad ātmanā kṛtam tan mayi saṃbhāvayasi /
GK20hdratn_u:636: jai evvaṃ mā khu maṃ ṇivāresu /
GK20hdratn_u:642: imiṇā pisuṇajaṇahiaakuḍileṇa daṇḍaaṭṭheṇa paripakkaṃ via phalaṃ imādo baulapāavādo tumaṃ pāḍaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:660: jādiso tae kāmadevo ālihido tādisī mae radī ālihidā /
GK20hdratn_u:668: tatsakhyāpi pratyabhijñāya vaidagdhyāt sāpi tatraiva rativyapadeśenālikhiteti /
GK20hdratn_u:678: īdisassa kaṇṇaāraaṇassa avassaṃ jevva īdise vare ahilāseṇa hodavvaṃ ti /
GK20hdratn_u:680: jā esā ālihidā sā khu kaṇṇaā daṃsaṇīā /
GK20hdratn_u:681: (2.55) Rājā / yady evam avahitau śṛṇuvas tāvat /
GK20hdratn_u:691: na kevala śrutam abhiprāyo 'pi lakṣita eva /
GK20hdratn_u:700: esā dāsīe dhīā caduvvedī via bamhaṇo ricāiṃ paḍhiduṃ pauttā /
GK20hdratn_u:710: ko 'nya evaṃvidhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhavantaṃ muktvaivaṃvidhānām ṛcām abhijñaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:716: ujjuaṃ jevva kiṃ ṇa bhaṇāsi jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:722: kim uccair vihasatā tyayeyam uttrāsitā yenoḍḍīyāny atra kvāpi gatā /
GK20hdratn_u:737: (2.72) Vidūṣakaḥ / kiṃ edāe dāsīe dhīāe sāriāe /
GK20hdratn_u:738: idha dāva mandamāruduvvellidabālakaalīdalasīdale silādale uvavisia muhuttaaṃ vīsamha /
GK20hdratn_u:743: ediṇā khu uṇa ugghāḍidaduvāreṇa tāe sāriāe pañjareṇa hodavvaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:756: edaṃ khu taṃ jaṃ mae bhaṇidaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:758: aṇṇadhā ko aṇṇo kusumacāvavavadeseṇa ṇiṇhūvīadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:763: sā vi kaṇṇaā idha jjevva ālihidā ciṭṭhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:764: tā kiṃ pāritosieṇa viṇā īdisaṃ kaṇṇaāraaṇaṃ daṃsīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:765: (2.82) Rājā / kaṭakaṃ samarpayann eva balād gṛhītvā savismayaṃ paśyati / vayasya /
GK20hdratn_u:768: api ca /vidhāyāpūrvapūrṇendum asyā mukham abhūd dhruvam /
GK20hdratn_u:773: cittaphalaaṃ pi dāva imādo kaalīharādo geṇhia lahuṃ gacchamha /
GK20hdratn_u:782: bhaṭṭiṇo vi idha jjevva hodavvaṃ ti /
GK20hdratn_u:790: eso de piavallaho tumaṃ jevva ṇivvaṇṇaanto ciṭṭhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:792: kiṃ ettha parihāsasīladāe imaṃ jaṇaṃ lahuṃ karesi /
GK20hdratn_u:798: (2.92) Susaṃgatā / daṃsidaṃ khu medhāviṇīe attaṇo medhāvittaṇaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:800: avi suhaadi de esā loaṇāiṃ ṇa vā /
GK20hdratn_u:802: kiṃ eso bhaṇissadi tti jaṃ saccaṃ maraṇajīvidāṇaṃ antare vaṭṭāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:808: me dṛṣṭis tṛṣiteva saṃprati śanair āruhya tuṅgau stanau
GK20hdratn_u:812: tumaṃ jevva suṇa jāe ālekkhaviṇṇāṇaṃ vaṇṇīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:814: jassa uṇa īdisīo vi piasamāgamaṃ bahumaṇṇanti tassa de attaṇo uvari ko parihavo jeṇa imāe jjevva ālihidaṃ attāṇaaṃ ṇa pekkhasi /
GK20hdratn_u:817: anayālikhito 'ham iti yat satyam idānīm ātmany eva bahumānaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:820: svedodgama iva karatalasaṃsparśād eva me vapuṣi // 35 // (2.10)
GK20hdratn_u:824: maṇoradho vi de ettiaṃ bhūmiṃ ṇa gado /
GK20hdratn_u:826: tumaṃ jevva ekkā salāhaṇīā jāe bhaṭṭā evvaṃ saṃtosīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:829: edaṃ avaraṃ sarasakamaliṇīdalamuṇālaviraidaṃ tāe maaṇāvatthāsūaaṃ saaṇīaṃ lakkhīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:835: api casthitam urasi viśālaṃ padminīpattram etat
GK20hdratn_u:852: tā ṇa juttaṃ ado avaraṃ uvekkhiduṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:856: jassa kade tumaṃ āadā so aaṃ de purado ciṭṭhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:872: jāva imādo kaalīharādo cittaphalaaṃ geṇhia āacchāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:877: esā khu devīe paricāriā susaṃgadā āadā /
GK20hdratn_u:884: ṇa kevalaṃ tumaṃ cittaphalaeṇa samaṃ savvo vi vuttanto mae viṇṇādo /
GK20hdratn_u:901: mae vi bhaṭṭiṇo pasādeṇa kīlidaṃ jevva /
GK20hdratn_u:904: jaṃ kīsa tae ahaṃ ettha cittaphalae ālihida tti kuvidā me piasahī sāariā /
GK20hdratn_u:912: kadā vi imiṇā puṇo vi kajjaṃ bhavissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:914: (2.122) Sāgarikā / rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā saharṣaṃ samādhvasaṃ sakampaṃ cātmānaṃ prati /
GK20hdratn_u:916: edaṃ pekkhia ṇa sakkaṇomi padādo padaṃ pi gantuṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:920: īdisaṃ pi ṇāma kaṇṇaāraaṇaṃ māṇusaloe dīsadi /
GK20hdratn_u:922: paāvadiṇo vi edaṃ ṇimmia vimhao samuppaṇṇo tti /
GK20hdratn_u:926: caturbhir api sādhu sādhv iti mukhaiḥ samaṃ vyāhṛtam /
GK20hdratn_u:934: dṛṣṭiṃ ruṣā kṣipasi bhāmini yady apīmāṃ
GK20hdratn_u:936: tyaktvā tvarāṃ vraja padaskhalitair ayaṃ te
GK20hdratn_u:945: esā khu tae apuvvā sirī samāsādidā /
GK20hdratn_u:947: śrīr eṣā pāṇir apy asyāḥ pārijātasya pallavaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:950: na khalu sakhījane yuktam evaṃvidhaṃ kopānubandhaṃ kartum /
GK20hdratn_u:952: adakkhiṇā si dāṇiṃ tumaṃ jā evvaṃ bhaṭṭiṇā hatthe avalambidā ajja vi kovaṃ ṇa muñcasi /
GK20hdratn_u:953: (2.132) Vidūṣakaḥ / esā khu avarā devī vāsavadattā /
GK20hdratn_u:964: esā khu avarā devī vāsavadattā adidīhakovaṇadāe saṃvutta tti /
GK20hdratn_u:966: prāptā katham api daivātkaṇṭham anītaiva sā prakaṭarāgā /
GK20hdratn_u:971: adha kettia dūre dāṇiṃ sā ajjauttaparigahidā ṇomāliā /
GK20hdratn_u:981: jadhā samīve bhaṭṭā mantedi tadhā takkemi /
GK20hdratn_u:994: (2.147) Rājā / devi / prathamam apy āgatair asmābhis tvaṃ cirayasīti naiva dṛṣṭā /
GK20hdratn_u:1004: iti bāhū prasārya nṛṭyan kakṣataṭāt phalake nipatite viṣādaṃ nāṭayati /
GK20hdratn_u:1024: appā kila dukkhaṃ ālihīadi tti mama vaaṇaṃ suṇia piavaasseṇa edaṃ viṇṇāṇaṃ daṃsidaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1029: esā vi jā avarā tuha samīve dīsadi edaṃ kiṃ ajjavasantaassa viṇṇāṇaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1033: iyaṃ hi mayā svacetasaiva parikalpyālikhitā na tu dṛṣṭapūrvā /
GK20hdratn_u:1036: savāmi bamhattaṇeṇa jai īdisī kadā vi diṭṭhapuvvā /
GK20hdratn_u:1048: mama uṇa edaṃ cittaphalaaṃ pekkhantīe sīsaveaṇā samuppaṇṇā /
GK20hdratn_u:1051: prasīdeti brūyām idam asati kope na ghaṭate
GK20hdratn_u:1052: kariṣyāmy eva no punar iti bhaved abhyupagamaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1053: na me doṣo 'stīti tvam idam api ca jñāsyasi mṛṣā
GK20hdratn_u:1054: kim etasmin vaktuṃ kṣamam iti na vedmi priyatame // 43 // (2.18)
GK20hdratn_u:1067: ābhijātyā nigūḍho na lakṣittas tvayā devyāḥ kopānubandhaḥ / tathā hi /
GK20hdratn_u:1068: bhṛūbhaṇge sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratām
GK20hdratn_u:1069: īṣan māṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram /
GK20hdratn_u:1071: kopaś ca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaś ca na praśrayaḥ // 44 // (2.19)
GK20hdratn_u:1079: avi diṭṭhā tae bhaṭṭiṇīsaāse kañcaṇamālā ṇa vā /
GK20hdratn_u:1082: ko vi kālo tāe āacchia gadāe tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1085: esā khu kañcaṇamālā ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1094: kiṃ ajjavasantaeṇa kadaṃ jeṇa so evvaṃ salāhīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1098: ṇa tumaṃ imaṃ rahassaṃ rakkhiduṃ pāresi /
GK20hdratn_u:1099: (3.5) Madanikā / savāmi devīe caraṇehiṃ jai kassa vi purado paāsemi /
GK20hdratn_u:1102: ajja kkhu mae rāaulādo paḍiṇivattantīe cittasāliāduvāre ajjavasantaassa susaṃgadāe samaṃ ālāvo sudo /
GK20hdratn_u:1108: ṇa kkhu sāariaṃ vajjia piavaassassa kiṃ pi assatthadāe kāraṇaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1113: ajja kkhu devīe cittaphalaavuttantasaṅkidāe sāariaṃ rakkhiduṃ mama hatthe samappaantīe
GK20hdratn_u:1114: jaṃ ṇevatthaṃ me pasādīkidaṃ teṇa jjevva viraidadevīvesaṃ sāariaṃ geṇhia ahaṃ pi
GK20hdratn_u:1117: tado māhavīladāmaṇḍave tāe saha bhaṭṭiṇo saṃgamo bhavissadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1118: (3.11) Madanikā / hadāsā tumaṃ susaṃgade jā evvaṃ pariaṇavacchalaṃ deviṃ vañcesi /
GK20hdratn_u:1122: (3.13) Madanikā / assatthasarīrassa bhaṭṭiṇo kusalavuttantaṃ jāṇiduṃ gadā tumaṃ ciraasi tti uttammantīe devīe pesida mhi /
GK20hdratn_u:1124: adiujjuā dāṇiṃ devī jā evvaṃ pattiāadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1126: eso kkhu bhaṭṭā assatthadāmiseṇa attaṇo maaṇāvatthaṃ pacchādaanto dantatoraṇavaḍabhīe uvaviṭṭho ciṭṭhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1143: jai sā asāmaṇṇarūvasohā tādisī tae ṇimmidā tā kīsa uṇa īdisaṃ avatthantaraṃ pāvidā /
GK20hdratn_u:1144: iaṃ ca raaṇamālā jīvidaṇirāsāe tāe kassa vi bamhaṇassa hatthe paḍivādesu tti bhaṇia mama hatthe samappidā /
GK20hdratn_u:1145: tā jāva kaṃ pi bamhaṇaṃ aṇṇesāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:1147: eso kkhu ajjavasantao ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1151: ajja kkhu piavaasseṇa pasādidāe devīe vāsavadattāe bandhaṇādo moāvia sahatthadiṇṇehiṃ modaehiṃ udaraṃ me pūridaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1165: sā khu tavassiṇī devīe ujjaiṇiṃ pesida tti pavādaṃ kadua addharatte uvaṭṭhide ṇa jāṇīadi kahiṃ ṇīda tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1169: (4.7) Susaṃgatā / iaṃ ca raaṇamālā tāe jīvidaṇirāsāe ajjavasantaassa hatthe paḍivādesu tti bhaṇia mama hatthe samappidā /
GK20hdratn_u:1172: ṇa me īdise patthāve hatthe edaṃ geṇhiduṃ pasaradi /
GK20hdratn_u:1175: tāe jjevva aṇuggahaṃ karanto aṅgīkaredu ajjo /
GK20hdratn_u:1177: adha vā uvaṇehi jeṇa imāe jjevva sāariāvirahadukkhidaṃ piavaassaṃ viṇodaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1181: kudo uṇa tāe īdissassa alaṅkārassa samāgamo /
GK20hdratn_u:1183: mae vi edaṃ jevva kodūhaleṇa pucchidā āsi /
GK20hdratn_u:1185: (4.15) Susaṃgatā / tado sā uddhaṃ pekkhia dīhaṃ ṇissasia susaṃgade kiṃ tuha edāe kadhāe tti bhaṇia rodiduṃ pauttā /
GK20hdratn_u:1186: (4.16) Vidūṣakaḥ / kadhidaṃ jevva sāmaṇṇajaṇadullaheṇa imiṇā paricchaeṇa /
GK20hdratn_u:1191: eso kkhu bhaṭṭā devībhavaṇādo ṇikkamia phaḍiasilāmaṇḍavaṃ gado /
GK20hdratn_u:1199: vailakṣyeṇa pareṇa pādapatanair vākyaiḥ sakhīnāṃ muhuḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1200: pratyāsattim upāgatā na hi tathā devī rudatyā yathā
GK20hdratn_u:1203: idānīṃ devyāṃ prasannāyāṃ sāgarikācintaiva māṃ bādhate / tathā hi
GK20hdratn_u:1208: yo 'pi me viśrāmasthānaṃ vasantakaḥ so 'pi devyā saṃyatas tiṣṭhati /
GK20hdratn_u:1213: eso kkhu ṇirantarukkaṇṭhāparikkhāmaṃ pi savisesasalāhaṇīaṃ taṇuṃ samuvvahanto udido via dudiācando adhiadaraṃ sohadi piavaasso /
GK20hdratn_u:1217: diṭṭhiā vaḍḍhasi devīhatthagadeṇāvi mae puṇo vi edehiṃ acchīhiṃ jaṃ diṭṭho si /
GK20hdratn_u:1224: (4.22) Rājā / veṣeṇaiva niveditas te devyāḥ prasādaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1241: śīghraṃ na yātha yadi tanmuṣitāḥ stha nūnaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:1252: tāe jjevva mama hatthe keṇāvi kajjeṇa iaṃ raaṇamālā pesidā /
GK20hdratn_u:1257: (4.34) Rājā / gṛhītvā ratnamālāṃ nirvarṇya hṛdaye vinyasya / ahaha /
GK20hdratn_u:1260: vayasya / tvam eva paridhatsva yena vayam enāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛtiṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1268: kadā vi ko vi idha saṃcaradi /
GK20hdratn_u:1272: eso kkhu rumaṇṇado bhāiṇeo vijaavammā piaṃ kiṃ pi ṇivedidukāmo duvāre ciṭṭhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1276: iti niṣkramya vijayavarmaṇā saha punaḥ praviśya ca /
GK20hdratn_u:1298: ito devādeśāt katipayair eva vāsarair anekakarituragapadātidurnivāreṇa mahatā balasamūhena
GK20hdratn_u:1299: gatvā rumaṇvān vindhyadurgāvasthitasya kosalapater dvāram avaṣṭabhya samāvāsayitum ārabdhavān /
GK20hdratn_u:1302: tataḥ kosaleśvaro 'pi darpāt paribhavam asahamāno hāstikaprāyam ātmasainyaṃ sajjīkṛtavān /
GK20hdratn_u:1310: yoddhuṃ nirgatya vindhyād abhavad abhimukhas tatkṣaṇaṃ digvibhāgān
GK20hdratn_u:1312: vegād bāṇān vimuñcann atha samadagajotpiṣṭapattir nipatya
GK20hdratn_u:1316: āhūyājimukhe sa kosalapatir bhagne pradhāne bale
GK20hdratn_u:1317: (4.51) Rājā / katham / asmadīyāny api balāni bhagnāni /
GK20hdratn_u:1324: mṛtyur api te ślāghyo yasya śatravo 'py evaṃ puruṣakāraṃ varṇayanti /
GK20hdratn_u:1326: rumaṇvān api kosaleṣu madbhrātaraṃ jyāyāṃsaṃ jayavarmāṇaṃ sthāpayitvā prahāravraṇitaṃ hāstakaprāyam aśeṣasainyam anuvartamānaḥ śanaiḥ śanair āgata eva /
GK20hdratn_u:1345: eso kkhu ujjaiṇīdo sambarasiddhī ṇāma indaālio āado /
GK20hdratn_u:1362: deva /kiṃ dharaṇīe miaṅgoāāse mahiharo jale jalaṇo /
GK20hdratn_u:1367: īdiso se avaṭṭhambho jeṇa savvaṃ saṃbhāvīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1369: kiṃ jappieṇa bahuṇājaṃ jaṃ hiaeṇa mahasi saṃdaṭṭhu /
GK20hdratn_u:1373: yuṣmadīya evāyam aindrajāliko vijanīkṛtaś cāyam uddeśaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1381: ujjaiṇīdo āado tti atthi me tassiṃ indaālie pakkhavādo /
GK20hdratn_u:1399: iti bahuvidhaṃ nāṭyaṃ kṛṭvā picchikāṃ bhrāmayan /
GK20hdratn_u:1409: eṣo 'py airāvatasthas tridaśapatir amī devi devās tathānye
GK20hdratn_u:1414: kiṃ edehiṃ devehiṃ accharāhiṃ ca daṃsidāhiṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1415: jai ediṇā parituṭṭheṇa kajja tā sāariaṃ daṃsehi /
GK20hdratn_u:1419: eso kkhu vikkamabāhuṇo padhāṇo amacco vasubhūdī kañcuiṇā saha aṇuppesido /
GK20hdratn_u:1420: taṃ arihadi devo imassiṃ jevva sundaramuhuttae pekkhiduṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1421: ahaṃ pi kajjasesaṃ samāvia āado jjevva tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1433: ekko uṇa kheḍaṇao avassaṃ deveṇa pekkhidavvo /
GK20hdratn_u:1451: saṃgītadhvaninā hṛtaḥ kṣitibhujāṃ goṣṭhīṣu tiṣṭhan kṣaṇam /
GK20hdratn_u:1453: dvāḥsthenaiva kutūhalena mahatā grāmyo yathāhaṃ kṛtaḥ // 75 // (4.12)
GK20hdratn_u:1454: (4.92) Bābhravyaḥ / adya khalu cirāt svāminaṃ drakṣyāmīti yat satyam ānandātiśayena kim apy avasthāntaram anubhavāmi / kutaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1458: jarāyāḥ sāhāyyaṃ mama hi paritoṣo 'dya kurute // 76 // (4.13)
GK20hdratn_u:1464: saiveyaṃ ratnamālā yā devena rājaputryai prasthānakāle datteti /
GK20hdratn_u:1467: tat kiṃ vasantakād avagacchāmi prabhavam asyāḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1470: mahati rājakule ratnānāṃ bāhulyān na durlabho bhūṣaṇānāṃ saṃvādaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1510: ciram api sthitvā yat kathanīyaṃ tad idānīm eva kathyatām /
GK20hdratn_u:1515: yāsau siṃhaleśvareṇa svaduhitā ratnāvalī nāmāyuṣmatī vāsavadattāṃ dagdhām upaśrutya devāya pūrvaprārthitā satī dattā /
GK20hdratn_u:1524: (4.118) Vasubhūtiḥ / sā ca yuṣmadantikam ānīyamānā yānabhaṅgāt sāgare nimagnā /
GK20hdratn_u:1534: vahanabhaṅgapatitotthitau nanv etāv eva te nidarśanam /
GK20hdratn_u:1544: harmyāṇāṃ hemaśṛṅgaśriyam iva nicayair arciṣām ādadhānaḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1549: kariṣyann iva taṃ satyaṃ manye 'gnir ayam utthitaḥ // 78 // (4.15)
GK20hdratn_u:1558: (4.126) Rājā / katham / atisaṃbhramād ihasthāpi devī nopalakṣitā /
GK20hdratn_u:1564: esā khu mae ṇigghiṇāe idha saṃjamidā sāariā vivajjadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1587: mama dukkhakāriṇīe vaaṇādo evvaṃ ajjhavasidaṃ ajjautteṇa /
GK20hdratn_u:1593: tan mamāpi dṛṣṭarājaputrīvipatter yuktam ātmānam āhutīkartum /
GK20hdratn_u:1596: kim idam akāraṇa eva bharatakulaṃ saṃśayatulām āropitam /
GK20hdratn_u:1602: samantado pajjalido hudavaho ajja dukkhāvasāṇaṃ me karissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:1603: (4.138) Rājā / aye / iyam āsannahutavahā sāgarikā vartate /
GK20hdratn_u:1608: tā edaṃ pekkhia puṇo me jīvidāsā saṃvuttā /
GK20hdratn_u:1612: muhūrtam api sahyatāṃ bahula eṣa dhūmodgamo
GK20hdratn_u:1613: hahā dhig idam aṃśukaṃ jvalati te stanāt pracyutam /
GK20hdratn_u:1614: muhuḥ skhalasi kiṃ kathaṃ nigaḍasaṃyatāsi drutaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:1621: vyaktaṃ lagno 'pi bhavatīṃ na dhakṣati hutāśanaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1622: yataḥ saṃtāpam evāyaṃ sparśas te harati priye // 81 // (4.18)
GK20hdratn_u:1642: svapne matir bhramati kiṃ nv idam indrajālam // 82 // (4.19)
GK20hdratn_u:1645: bhaṇidaṃ khu teṇa dāsīe puttaeṇa indajālieṇa jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:1646: avassaṃ jevva deveṇa ekko me kheḍaṇao pekkhidavvo tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1647: (4.150) Rājā / devi / tvadvacanād iyam ānītā sāgarikā /
GK20hdratn_u:1665: esā khu sāariādo pāvida tti bhaṇia amaccajoandharāaṇeṇa mama hatthe ṇikkhittā /
GK20hdratn_u:1669: katham asau mamānivedya kiṃ cit kariṣyati /
GK20hdratn_u:1672: yathā susadṛśī vasantakasya kaṇṭhe ratnamālā asyāś ca sāgarāt prāptis tathā vyaktam eveyaṃ siṃhaleśvarasya duhitā ratnāvalī /
GK20hdratn_u:1695: (4.166) Rājā / katham / udāttavaṃśaprabhavasya siṃhaleśvarasya vikramabahor ātmajeyam /
GK20hdratn_u:1698: ṇa kkhu īdiso sāmaṇṇajaṇassa paricchao bhodi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1706: nanv iyaṃ te jyāyasī bhaginī duḥkham āste /
GK20hdratn_u:1708: (4.170) Ratnāvalī / samāśvasya rājānaṃ tiryag avalokya svagatam /
GK20hdratn_u:1722: amaccajoandharāaṇeṇa ettiaṃ kālaṃ dujjaṇīkida mhi jeṇa jāṇanteṇa vi ṇa me ṇivedidaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1725: devyā madvacanād yathābhyupagataḥ patyur viyogas tathā
GK20hdratn_u:1726: sā devasya kalatrasaṃghaṭanayā duḥkhaṃ mayā sthāpitā /
GK20hdratn_u:1727: tasyāḥ prītim ayaṃ kariṣyati jagatsvāmitvalābhaḥ prabhoḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1728: satyaṃ darśayituṃ tathāpi vadanaṃ śaknomi no lajjayā // 83 // (4.20)
GK20hdratn_u:1729: atha vā kiṃ kriyata īdṛśam atyantamānanīyeṣv api niranurodhavṛtti svāmibhaktivratam /
GK20hdratn_u:1747: yo 'syāḥ pāṇigrahaṇaṃ kariṣyati sa sārvabhaumo rājā bhaviṣyatīti /
GK20hdratn_u:1748: tatas tatpratyayād asmābhiḥ svāmino 'rthe bahuśaḥ prārthyamānenāpi siṃhaleśvareṇa devyā vāsavadattāyāś cittakhedaṃ pariharatā yadā na dattā
GK20hdratn_u:1751: tadā lāvaṇake devī dagdheti prasiddhim utpādya tadantikaṃ bābhravyaḥ prahitaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1754: atheyaṃ devīhaste kim ity anucintya sthāpitā /
GK20hdratn_u:1755: (4.181) Vidūṣakaḥ / aṇācakkhidaṃ pi edaṃ jāṇīadi jjevva jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:1756: anteuragadā suheṇa de daṃsaṇapadhaṃ gamissadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1762: anyathāntaḥpure baddhāyā asyāḥ kuto devena darśanam /
GK20hdratn_u:1765: parijñātāyāś ca bhaginyāḥ saṃprati yathā karaṇīyaṃ tatra devī pramāṇam /
GK20hdratn_u:1768: phuḍāṃ jevva kiṃ ṇa bhaṇāsi jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:1774: ettiaṃ pi dāva mama bahiṇiāṇurūvaṃ bhodu /
GK20hdratn_u:1775: iti ratnāvalīṃ svakīyair ābharaṇair alaṅkṛtya haste gṛhītvā rājānam upasṛtya /
GK20hdratn_u:1779: ko devyāḥ prasādaṃ na bahu manyate /
GK20hdratn_u:1783: tā tadhā karesu jadhā bandhujaṇaṃ ṇa sumaredi /
GK20hdratn_u:1796: (4.196) Rājā / kim ataḥ param api priyam asti / yataḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1799: devī prītim upāgatā ca bhaginīlābhāj jitāḥ kosalāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1800: kiṃ nāsti tvayi saty amātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām // 84 // (4.21)
GK20hdratn_u:1802: urvīm uddāmasasyāṃ janayatu visṛjanvāsavo vṛṣṭim iṣṭām
GK20hdratn_u:1804: ākalpāntaṃ ca bhūyat samupacitasukhaḥ saṃgamaḥ sajjanānāṃ
GK20hdratn_u:1805: niḥśeṣā yāntu śāntiṃ piśunajanagiro durjayā vajralepāḥ // 84 // (4.22)
